game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, players take on the role of a novice mage seeking to reclaim their lost abilities.
game.ending: The player's ultimate goal is to restore magic to the world and defeat the dark sorcerer responsible for its disappearance.
game.synopsis: In this high-fantasy adventure game, players embark on a perilous journey across treacherous landscapes and battle fearsome enemies as they search for the secrets of their lost magical abilities. Along the way, they must navigate complex relationships with other mages, form alliances with mythical creatures, and make difficult choices that will shape the fate of their world.
game.title: Reclaiming Magic
